Message:
A blade isn’t the only thing
that can kill a person.
A single glance can prove
to be just as deadly.

That’s all it takes
to kill someone.

A heart that has grown
familiar with inflicting
and feeling pain eventually
forgets what pain even is.

That’s why you must all
look with your own eyes
and listen with your own ears
before judging anyone else.

This is what it means
to learn and grow.

then think of ways
to solve them.

There are no questions
that can’t be solved.
The answers you seek are
certainly just hidden away.

As I taught my students
that lesson, I also spoke
those words to myself.

The answer to breaking
these chains is also
hidden away...

It was then that
a certain rumor spread.

A rumor of a woman
who lures children away
before turning them
into witches.
